## IView interface

A view is the base class for any visual UI component.

View components are implemented using React components, and the render() method should return a React element.

Example:

```typescript
class MyView implements IView {
  render() {
    return <MyComponent />;
  }
}

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IView 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [close()](./core-ui.iview.close.md) | Called when the view is no longer used<!-- -->This means the view can clean up any resources used. |
|  [render()](./core-ui.iview.render.md) | Return a React element to be rendered in the UI |
